title: Water Under the Bridge
author: Adele
lyrics:
[00:09.91] If you're not the one for me
[00:14.57] Then how come I can bring you to your knees?
[00:19.89] If you're not the one for me
[00:24.59] Why do I hate the idea of being free?
[00:29.99] And if I'm not the one for you
[00:34.32] You've gotta stop holding me the way you do
[00:39.63] Oh, honey, if I'm not the one for you
[00:44.08] Why have we been through what we have been through?
[00:49.65] It's so cold out here in your wilderness
[00:59.94] I want you to be my keeper
[01:05.30] But not if you are so reckless
[01:10.19] If you're gonna let me down, let me down gently
[01:13.42] Don't pretend that you don't want me
[01:15.98] Our love ain't water under the bridge
[01:20.05] If you're gonna let me down, let me down gently
[01:23.32] Don't pretend that you don't want me
[01:25.91] Our love ain't water under the bridge
[01:30.13] Woah-woah
[01:35.19] Say that our love ain't water under the bridge
[01:41.67] What are you waiting for?
[01:44.95] You never seem to make it through the door
[01:50.64] And who are you hiding from?
[01:55.01] It ain't no life to live like you're on the run
[02:00.85] Have I ever asked for much?
[02:05.40] The only thing that I want is your love
[02:10.88] If you're gonna let me down, let me down gently
[02:13.96] Don't pretend that you don't want me
[02:16.19] Our love ain't water under the bridge
[02:20.74] If you're gonna let me down, let me down gently
[02:24.18] Don't pretend that you don't want me
[02:26.73] Our love ain't water under the bridge
[02:31.65] Woah-woah
[02:36.16] Say that our love ain't water under the bridge
[02:40.71] It's so cold in your wilderness
[02:50.85] I want you to be my keeper
[02:56.45] But not if you are so reckless
[03:02.73] If you're gonna let me down, let me down gently
[03:05.68] Don't pretend that you don't want me
[03:08.24] Our love ain't water under the bridge
[03:12.79] If you're gonna let me down, let me down gently
[03:15.82] Don't pretend that you don't want me
[03:18.24] Our love ain't water under the bridge
[03:23.08] (Say it ain't so, say it ain't so)
[03:25.45] (Say it ain't so, say it ain't so)
[03:28.03] Say that our love ain't water under the bridge
[03:33.03] (Say it ain't so, say it ain't so)
[03:35.88] (Say it ain't so, say it ain't so)
[03:37.95] Say that our love ain't water under the bridge
[03:42.95] 
[03:48.05] Say that our love ain't water under the bridge
[03:51.47]
